titleStmt.title: Certaine queries concerning the danger of taking the late forced engagement: sent from the generall assembly of divines of the Kirk of Scotland, to their Presbyterian brethren the Mnisters [sic] of London..
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

titleStmt.title: Certaine queries concerning the danger of taking the late forced engagement: sent from the generall assembly of divines of the Kirk of Scotland, to their Presbyterian brethren the Mnisters [sic] of London..
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

notesStmt.note: Arguments against taking the oath of October 11, 1649, pledging faith to the Commonwealth of England.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
